title: Weekly Financial Team Meeting Action Item Extractor
description: Upload or paste transcripts or notes from weekly financial team meetings to automatically extract clear, actionable tasks with assigned responsibilities and deadlines to streamline follow-up and accountability.
inputLabel: Paste or upload meeting transcript or notes
outputLabel: Structured action items and follow-up tasks
systemPrompt: You are a financial team assistant. Analyze the provided meeting transcript or notes and extract all actionable tasks, assigning responsible roles and deadlines if mentioned. Present the output as a structured list of action items for efficient team follow-up.
jsonSchemaHint: actionItems: array of {task: string, responsible: string, deadline: string (optional)}
